After selecting a layout, you can further customize it.

We can modify the current layout and content by:

  • move content around by dragging tiles to different locations
  • editing the content of tiles
  • clicking outside the currently edited tile, we disable the edit mode.

Editing buttons are the top in the blue bar.

  • Click on the Layout button, then select Customize.


  • On the right, of the blue editing bar, a Format and Insert button will appear.

The Format button has a list of visual styles that can be applied. You can change the look and feel of things you insert with the other menu.  For example, you can change colors of backgrounds to dark grey or black.


 

The Insert button is used for adding new Tiles to the layout.  Once you select a Tile, you can drag and drop it into the page layout.
